name: Hivemind in the Veinverse
description:
~ ⨀ ~ GAMEPLAY SUMMARY ~ ⨀ ~

In this game, you control a swarm of floating eyes trying to protect a floating brain from harm while traversing an endless expanse of hazards and obstructions, you also have to keep moving to escape a flood of blood in this fun, infinite action strategy arcade-like mouse only game!

~ ⨂ ~ INSTRUCTIONS ~ ⨂ ~

Click and hold to move, click and hold on walls, objects, and enemies to send you swarm to go attack it (some hazards and objects will require you yourself to go collect them), click on the button to send one unit of you swarm to go on the defend (click on your eye to send a defending unit back to you), click on defending units to sacrifice them for a short burst of speed for the VeinBrein, defend the VeinBrein from harm and movement obstructions (the VeinBrein is the brain with 1 eye that you spawn next that creates new units to add to your swarm) keep on moving so you don't get engulphed by the blood flood! Discover what things do and how to deal with them yourself!

~ ⨀ ~ SOME BACKSTORY ~ ⨀ ~

Welcome to the Veinverse, a narrow, endless vein like expanse that is filled with hazards and obstructions, do you have what it takes to grow and protect your hivemind into and (almost) unstoppable swarm?
